question: Who has won the menâ€™s singles title at the 2019 Miami Open tennis tournament?
explanation: In tennis, Roger Federer lifted his fourth ATP Miami Open title with an emphatic 6-1, 6-4 win over defending champion John Isner on 31st March 2019 at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, States. It is Swiss player\'s 28th Masters title and the 101st overall for a player who has won 20 Grand Slam singles titles.
